医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Dupilumab 在治疗伴有 2 型炎症的 COPD 的 3 期试验中显示出有希望的结果患有 2 型炎症的慢性阻塞性肺病患者可能很快就会获得一种新药——；杜匹鲁单抗-;研究人员在《新英格兰医学杂志》上报告说，一项关键的 3 期临床试验表明患者的病情得到了快速而持续的改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Dupilumab-shows-promising-results-in-Phase-3-trial-for-COPD-with-type-2-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Dupilumab-shows-promising-results-in-Phase-3-trial-for-COPD-with-type-2-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c75dd87-685f-4146-a7ce-b0a3dc1d579b Mon, 20 May 2024 22:19:57 -0400 Dupilumab shows promising results in Phase 3 trial for COPD with type 2 inflammation
研究发现冥想中常见的意识状态改变瑜伽、正念、冥想、呼吸和其他练习因其改善健康和福祉的潜力而越来越受欢迎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Altered-states-of-意识-common-in-meditation-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Altered-states-of-意识-common-in-meditation-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cfa44b0-0706-4555-87f1-8ad039d5356e Mon, 20 May 2024 22:13:38 -0400 Altered states of consciousness common in meditation, study finds
研究人员设计新的再生医学疗法以加速糖尿病伤口修复西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员设计了一种再生医学疗法来加速糖尿病伤口修复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Researchers-design-new-rogenic-medicine-therapy-to-accelerate-diabetic-wound-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Researchers-design-new-rogenic-medicine-therapy-to-accelerate-diabetic-wound-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ab61c03-613b-4117-8ebb-2bc7897f32d7 Mon, 20 May 2024 22:07:44 -0400 Researchers design new regenerative medicine therapy to accelerate diabetic wound repair
研究发现救护车中的早期血压控制对中风患者没有明显的好处《新英格兰医学杂志》发表的研究评估了救护车中早期血压控制对急性中风患者的影响，发现与标准护理相比，临床结果没有显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Early-blood-Pressure-control-in-ambulances-shows-no-clear-benefit-for-中风-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Early-blood-Pressure-control-in-ambulances-shows-no-clear-benefit-for-中风-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c0bf6a6-b2f4-4504-b1ef-932b0d28562b Mon, 20 May 2024 20:49:00 -0400 Early blood pressure control in ambulances shows no clear benefit for stroke patients, study finds
世界卫生组织的新 SkinNTD 应用程序在培训医护人员应对被忽视的热带病方面被证明是有效的由世界卫生组织开发的 SkinNTD 应用程序显示出在培训低收入和中等收入国家的一线医护人员诊断和管理被忽视的热带病方面的前景。加纳和肯尼亚的早期评估表明该应用程序用户友好、有效且对偏远地区有价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/WHOs-new-SkinNTD-app-proves- effective-in-training-healthcare-workers-for-neglected-tropical-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/WHOs-new-SkinNTD-app-proves- effective-in-training-healthcare-workers-for-neglected-tropical-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98961edf-e6c2-4dd3-b39b-139784355fbf Mon, 20 May 2024 20:40:00 -0400 WHO's new SkinNTD app proves effective in training healthcare workers for neglected tropical diseases
孕妇氟化物含量较高与儿童的神经行为问题有关佛罗里达大学公共卫生与健康专业学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，孕妇体内较高的氟化物含量与其孩子在 3 岁时出现神经行为问题的几率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Higher-fluide-levels-in-pregnant-women-tied-to-childrens-neurobehavioral-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Higher-fluide-levels-in-pregnant-women-tied-to-childrens-neurobehavioral-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a715393c-b8b7-41aa-bbea-b509d742649d Mon, 20 May 2024 15:19:17 -0400 Higher fluoride levels in pregnant women tied to children's neurobehavioral problems
印度地方性人群中发现遗传性铁缺陷尽管缺铁性贫血是全球最普遍的贫血形式，但由于缺乏认识或缺乏系统的筛查，它可能被诊断不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Inherited-iron-defects-uncovered-in-endemic-Indian-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Inherited-iron-defects-uncovered-in-endemic-Indian-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=649b8855-c7c1-4761-9445-e54be8769c52 Mon, 20 May 2024 15:13:00 -0400 Inherited iron defects uncovered in endemic Indian population
查加斯病引起的心脏损伤的新机制被发现乔蒂·纳加乔蒂博士和她在哈肯萨克子午线发现与创新中心 (CDI) 的实验室已经确定了慢性恰加斯病（一种影响全世界数百万人的寄生虫感染）可能导致不可逆转且可能致命的心脏损伤的主要机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-mechanism-discovered-for-Chagas-disease-induced-heart-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-mechanism-discovered-for-Chagas-disease-induced-heart-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f57ceeb1-5adc-40de-901e-2657b58d0149 Mon, 20 May 2024 15:08:35 -0400 New mechanism discovered for Chagas disease-induced heart damage
细菌中两种新发现的机制可能导致抗生素耐药性细菌中两种新发现的机制已被确定，它们可能有助于抗生素耐药性的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Two-newly-discovered-mechanisms-in-bacteria-can-contribute-to-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Two-newly-discovered-mechanisms-in-bacteria-can-contribute-to-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f61c7f2a-4436-498a-9100-824b747cf0ea Mon, 20 May 2024 14:40:00 -0400 Two newly discovered mechanisms in bacteria can contribute to antibiotic resistance
禁用生存途径可能是脑肿瘤治疗的一种有前途的策略当你禁用赛车的刹车时，它很快就会崩溃。 Barak Rotblat 博士想要对脑癌细胞进行类似的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Disabling-survival-pathways-could-be-a-promising-strategy-for-brain-tumor-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Disabling-survival-pathways-could-be-a-promising-strategy-for-brain-tumor-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3f9b487-362d-4acc-9875-538fa8e29c3f Mon, 20 May 2024 14:32:56 -0400 Disabling survival pathways could be a promising strategy for brain tumor treatment
